title: Ep. 980 - Pro-Abortion Leftists Dissolve Into Delicious Puddles Of Rage And Sadness
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Leftists across the country are melting into puddles of sadness and rage over the overturning of Roe. Many major corporations are coming to their aide by promising to pay for their employees abortions. This is supposed to be empowering for women but it’s exactly the opposite. We’ll talk about why. Also, the Supreme Court is on a historic hot streak with another major and majorly correct decision coming down this morning, this one pertaining to prayer in schools. And Amazon employees protest Johnny the Walrus during the Seattle Pride Parade. In our daily cancellation, many pro-abortion women are pledging to practice abstinence in response to the Roe decision. I could not be a bigger fan of that idea. All of that, plus a very special treat for the Sweet Baby Gang that you’ll have to see to believe.
